visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: 'Food Popularity', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark theme with white text for labels and titles, Data series: Include three series with the names 'Bakso', 'Dahipuri', and 'Mochi', each with corresponding data points from the provided table, Custom colors: Use shades of blue for the columns, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to black, add a legend, and adjust the margins for better visibility.
visualization_explanation: The Highcharts configuration object provided is designed to render a column chart with a dark theme, suitable for displaying the popularity of different food items. The chart type is set to 'column', and the title is 'Food Popularity'. The axes and labels are styled with white text to contrast against the black background. The data series include three food items: 'Bakso', 'Dahipuri', and 'Mochi', each with their respective popularity data points. The columns are colored using shades of blue to differentiate between the series. Additional configurations include enabling the legend and adjusting the chart margins for better readability and visual appeal.
